channel.title: BrokenITGuy Updates
channel.description: Live log entries from the headless pipeline.

item.title: Update: No Date
item.description: Began the initial formulation of a new design for the bakers site.

item.title: Update: No Date
item.description:
Focus shifted to my niece's website development.
First webpage ever, seeking feedback!

item.title: Update: No Date
item.description:
Yesterday, a Windows Server was established to host a monitoring server.
This server will display the health of all VMS on a dedicated screen.
Today, a Pinut server was built.

item.title: Update: No Date
item.description:
Media server has been successfully deployed.
While there are occasional container crashes, Plex remains operational and stable.

item.title: Update: No Date
item.description:
Successfully resolved lingering networking and VPN issues.
Leveraged AI assistance through iterative prompting to achieve a functional state for these services.

item.title: Update: No Date
item.description:
Initiated a new approach for the media server utilizing Docker.
Initial deployment successful.

item.title: Update: No Date
item.description:
Plex functionality has been successfully integrated.
VPN and networking stability require further investigation.

item.title: Update: No Date
item.description:
Despite experiencing pain, the developer is determined to work today.
This signifies a strong commitment to productivity.

item.title: Update: No Date
item.description:
It is 4 AM and the developer has conceded defeat to the current issue for the night.
Further attempts will be made tomorrow.

item.title: Update: No Date
item.description:
The development server has been reset and is being re-initialized. This action was taken due to persistent, unidentified issues preventing functionality.
The previous state could not be salvaged.
